short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: automatically redirects you from localized MS knowledge content to the original English pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will automatically redirect from localized MS knowledge and cloud pages (learn.microsoft.com, azure.microsoft.com and support.microsoft.com) to the native en-us version to avoid frustration by poorly translated content.
Helpful for developers and IT professionals who prefer to work with the original content. 
Redirection can be toggled on a per domain basis and settings are synchronized across your devices.
Inspired by https://github.com/AirLancer/ffs_msdn_in_english but using the up to date declarativeNetRequest API.
